description: Deletes a specific version of a slot type. To delete all versions of a slot type, use the  DeleteSlotType operation. This operation requires permissions for the lex:DeleteSlotTypeVersion action.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the slot type.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the slot type to delete. You cannot delete the $LATEST version of the slot type. To delete the $LATEST version, use the  DeleteSlotType operation.
